title: NgRx Feature Generator
description: Generate a complete NgRx feature module with actions, effects, facade, feature, and tests based on the profiles feature pattern.

pluralName.description: The plural name of the feature (e.g., 'users', 'products', 'orders')
pluralName.x-prompt: What is the plural name of the feature? (e.g., users, products, orders)

singularName.description: The singular name of the feature (e.g., 'user', 'product', 'order')
singularName.x-prompt: What is the singular name of the feature? (e.g., user, product, order)

project.description: The name of the project to add the feature to
project.x-prompt: Which project should contain the feature?
